title: What Does ‘The Market’ Even Mean?
description:
On today’s Loose Change episode presented by Public.com, Berna is back with Amanda Holden aka Dumpster Doggy to continue their conversation about investing. They discuss some common investment terms that get thrown around and what you should know about them, including stuff like stocks, bonds, market, and everything in between. Amanda also talks about the best investment she’s ever made and how she got there. Make sure to follow us @whenshappyhr to stay up to date with the podcast and submit your questions!
Thanks again to our presenting sponsor Public.com! Visit public.com/betches to sign up and get started today.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
